scripts.test: lab -r console -o stdout -r html -o build/report/coverage.html -r lcov -o build/report/lcov.info
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm test && npm run lint && npm pack && tar -C build/tmp/ -xvzf wasserstandinfo-prefetch-*.tgz && pushd build/tmp/package && npm i --production && zip -r -1 ../../lambda.zip * && popd
scripts.update: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wasserstandinfoPrefetch --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build/lambda.zip
scripts.publish:
(git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || echo 'Cannot publish dirty repo! Please stash or commit your changes

' && exit 1) && npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wasserstandinfoPrefetch --region eu-west-1 --zip-file fileb://build/lambda.zip --publish
scripts.invoke.remote: aws lambda invoke --function-name wasserstandinfoPrefetch --region eu-west-1 out.json
scripts.lambda.set.bucket.name: aws lambda update-function-configuration --function-name wasserstandinfoPrefetch --environment 'Variables={UPLOAD_BUCKET_NAME="dschmitz.wasserstandsinfo"}' --region eu-west-1
